<style>
/* Style for the form container */
.form-container {
  max-width: 95%;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  margin-top:38px
}

/* Style for form labels */
.form-label {
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Style for input fields */
.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  margin: 5px 0 20px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Style for submit button */
.form-submit {
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Hover effect for submit button */
.form-submit:hover {
  background-color: #0056b3;
}

</style>

<!-- <hr> -->

<script>
function submitForm() {
  var name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  var institution = document.getElementById("institution").value;
  var subject = document.getElementById("subject").value;
  var message = document.getElementById("message").value;

  var body = "Name: " + name + "\n\n" +
             "Institution: " + institution + "\n\n" +
             "Subject: " + subject + "\n\n" +
             "Message: " + message;

  var mailtoURL = "mailto:S.J.Marrink@rug.nl" +
                  "?subject=" + encodeURIComponent(subject) +
                  "&body=" + encodeURIComponent(body);

  document.location.href = mailtoURL;
}
</script>

<div class="form-container">
  <form onsubmit="submitForm(); return false;">
    <label class="form-label" for="name">Name:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="name" name="name" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="institution">Institution:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="institution" name="institution" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="subject">Subject:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="subject" name="subject"><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="message">Message:</label><br>
    <textarea class="form-input" id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea><br>
    <input class="form-submit" type="submit" value="Send">
  </form>
</div>
